properties.title: Täschhütte SAC
properties.description: An alpine cabin in Mattertal surrounded by the well-known four-thousanders of the Mischabel range. The popular mountain hostel above Täschalp is primarily the starting point of various high alpine tours. The view from the newly constructed building goes directly to Weisshorn and Zinalrothorn on the other side of the valley. Looking southwards across Pfulwepass one can see Dufourspitze. In spring there are attractive, but challenging ski mountaineering tours.
